feed.title: Algebra & Combinatorics Reading Group
feed.subtitle: The homepage for the reading group for the Algebra & Combinatorics research group at the University of Galway.

entry.title: Combinatorial Hodge Theory
entry.content:
We are reading texts that cover the somewhat new field of combinatorial Hodge theory. Our primary sources are

  • Combinatorics and Hodge Theory by June Huh,
  • Hodge theory for matroids by Joshua Wang

We meet on Fridays at 1:00pm. Contact Joshua Maglione if you are interested in joining.

Date Reading
12 Jan Voted
19 Jan pp. 212–218 Huh
26 Jan pp. 217–222 Huh
02 Feb Section 2 Huh
09 Feb Sections 1 & 2 Wang
16 Feb pp. 12–16 Wang
23 Feb pp. 12–16 Wang
01 Mar pp. 15–22 Wang
08 Mar pp. 18–22 Wang
15 Mar Sections 3.2 & 4.1 Wang
22 Mar TBD
29 Mar TBD

entry.title: Combinatorial Commutative Algebra
entry.content: We are reading the first chapter of Richard P. Stanley’s Combinatorics and Commutative Algebra book.
entry.summary: We are reading the first chapter of Richard P. Stanley’s Combinatorics and Commutative Algebra book.
